pasta.util

Class PASTAUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.util.PASTAUtil

  • @Component
public class PASTAUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Groups together commonly used methods.

    All methods are static.

    Since:
    2014-01-31
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

                            java.lang.String assessmentName,
                            java.lang.String assessmentDate)
        Helper method for generateFileTree(String)
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        assessmentName - the name of the assessment
        assessmentDate - the date of the assessment
        Returns:
        the file tree node that is root for the file tree.

      • generateFileTree

        Recursively generate the FileTreeNode based on a location.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the root
        Returns:
        the root node for the file system

        Read a file and store it as a string
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • genereateFileTree

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FileTreeNode> genereateFileTree(java.lang.String username,
                                                             java.lang.String assessmentName)
        Generate the file tree nodes for all submission attempts for a user and assessment.

        Calls generateFileTree(String) for all submission attempts.

        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        assessmentName - the short (no whitespace) name of the assessment
        Returns:
        the map of file tree nodes for each submission with the submission date as a key.

      • generateFileTree

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FileTreeNode> generateFileTree(java.lang.String username,
                                                            java.lang.String competitionName,
                                                            java.util.Collection<PlayerHistory> players)
        Generate the file tree for the players used by arena based competitions.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        competitionName - the short (no whitespace) name of the competition
        players - a collection of players you are interested in.
        Returns:
        the map of file tree nodes, with the name of the player as the key.

      • zip

        public static void zip(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zip,
       java.io.File file,
       java.lang.String remove)
        Zip up a file or folder.
        Parameters:
        zip - the stream which holds the zip (so you can serve it straight to the user).
        file - the root file/folder
        remove - the string part of the path that should be removed (e.g. /user/PASTA/submissions/username/assessment....)
